sourcesContent:
{{ error_msg }}

import { Component, OnInit, Input } from "@angular/core"; import { FormsService } from "src/modules/form/services/forms.service"; @Component({ selector: "app-form-error", templateUrl: "./form-error.component.html", styleUrls: ["./form-error.component.css"], }) export class FormErrorComponent implements OnInit { @Input() httpResponse: any = {}; @Input() inputName: string | undefined; public error_msg: string | undefined; constructor( private formsService: FormsService, ) {} /** * @description: Initialisation du composant. */ public ngOnInit(): void { } /* * @description: */ public ngOnChanges(changes: any): void { // if (this.formsService.notHasError(this.httpResponse, this.inputName)) { // this.error_msg = undefined; // return; // } this.error_msg = this.formsService.getErrorMsg(this.httpResponse, this.inputName); } }
